00008   $res = array();
00009   $query = "SELECT id, name, creation_date, modification_date FROM observatories ORDER BY modification_date DESC";
00010   $result = mysqli_query($link, $query);
00011   while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00012     $res[] = $row;
00013   mysqli_free_result($result);
00014 
00015   if (count($res) == 0)
00016   {
00017     print "<CENTER><H3>There are no Observatory entries " .
00018           "to edit.</H3></CENTER>" . LF;
00019   }
00020   else
00021   {
00022         print "<CENTER><P><TABLE border='1' cellpadding='4' width='100%' class='rtable'>" . LF;

00025

00028     {
00029         print "<TR align='center'>";
